ruleConfiguration.sourceDatasource:
ds0: !!org.apache.shardingsphere.orchestration.core.common.yaml.config.YamlDataSourceConfiguration
  dataSourceClassName: com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource2
  props:
    password: 123456
    dataSourceJNDI: null
    transactionIsolation: null
    connectionTestQuery: null
    driverClassName: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
    initializationFailTimeout: 1
    jdbcUrl: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/order_1?useSSL=false
    minimumIdle: 10
    maxLifetime: 1800000
    schema: null
    maximumPoolSize: 10
    validationTimeout: 5000
    dataSourceClassName: null
    connectionTimeout: 30000
    idleTimeout: 600000
    leakDetectionThreshold: 0
    connectionInitSql: null
    poolName: HikariPool-1
    catalog: null
    username: root
ds1: !!org.apache.shardingsphere.orchestration.core.common.yaml.config.YamlDataSourceConfiguration
  dataSourceClassName: com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource
  props:
    password: 123456
    dataSourceJNDI: null
    transactionIsolation: null
    connectionTestQuery: null
    driverClassName: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
    initializationFailTimeout: 1
    jdbcUrl: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/order_0?useSSL=false
    minimumIdle: 10
    maxLifetime: 1800000
    schema: null
    maximumPoolSize: 10
    validationTimeout: 5000
    dataSourceClassName: null
    connectionTimeout: 30000
    idleTimeout: 600000
    leakDetectionThreshold: 0
    connectionInitSql: null
    poolName: HikariPool-2
    catalog: null
    username: root
ruleConfiguration.sourceRule:
tables:
  t_order:
    actualDataNodes: ds$->{0..1}.t_order_$->{0..1}
    databaseStrategy:
      standard:
        shardingColumn: user_id
        shardingAlgorithmName: t_order_database_inline
    logicTable: t_order
    tableStrategy:
      standard:
        shardingColumn: order_id
        shardingAlgorithmName: t_order_inline
shardingAlgorithms:
  t_order_database_inline:
    type: INLINE
    props:
      algorithm.expression: ds$->{user_id % 2}
  t_order_inline:
    type: INLINE
    props:
      algorithm.expression: t_order_$->{order_id % 2}
